name: Métro, boulot, dodo
description:
The informal French expression métro, boulot, dodo  is a  way of saying that you live to work.

Experiment the daily routine of a regular office employee! It can get quite... intense. 

Will you get along with your coworkers? Will you achieve more paperwork than the others? Will you face a burnout?

This game was made  in 72 hours during the minijam 100. The theme was Overload and limitation was Chaos is Everything

We hope you will like it!

Video of the full gameplay
